cast.overview: A hack screenwriter writes a screenplay for a former silent film star who has faded into Hollywood obscurity.
cast.title: Sunset Boulevard

details.biography: Lloyd Gough was an American character actor known for his work in film, television, and theater. He appeared in numerous movies and TV shows from the 1940s through the 1970s, often portraying tough or authoritative characters. Gough's roles were diverse, ranging from crime dramas to Westerns, and he was recognized for his versatility and ability to bring depth to his characters. Some of his notable film credits include "The Front," "A Double Life," and "The Green Berets."
details.name: Lloyd Gough
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
